title: Sold: 26 raw low grade t206's with SL and Bobby Wallace

posts.post_title: Sold: 26 raw low grade t206's with SL and Bobby Wallace
posts.post_content:
All of these cards have been sold.  Thanks Chris, Keith, and Jason.

priced individually, sold cards noted. Paypal only. please add $2 for shipping.
take all 25 remaining for $385 delivered.
If you need better scans, just ask.

$25 each:
Wallace
Revelle 
Cranston (measures SHORT)
Paige
Molesworth
Lentz

$20 each:
Maddox
Camnitz (Arms Folded)
Jordan (Brooklyn, Portrait)
Strang
Merkle (Throwing)
Delehanty (Louisville)
Konetchy (Glove High) (measures SHORT)

$15 each:
Murray (Portrait)
Ball (New York)
[STRIKE]Carrigan[/STRIKE] SOLD
Oakes
Casey

I'll take the Carrigan.  PM on the way.
